contents: My name is Maria Martinez, and I am applying for the graphic designer position at Signs and Banners. I am artistic, detail-oriented, and personable. My goal is to make the client happy by providing artwork that satisfies us both. I accomplish this feat through excellence. To borrow a (13) <u>phrase off of</u> Henry Ford, “Mediocrity is the worst enemy of prosperity.” I intend to prosper in the arts through avoiding mediocrity and striving for greatness, even in the most simple and commercial tasks. I understand that a satisfied customer is likely to be a repeat customer, or even a customer for life.
